bio:
My mission is to consistently deliver inspired projects through thoughtful imagination and personal connection.

I currently work remotely as the Director of Communications for an elementary education program. I am also a freelance graphic designer and am looking to expand my client list. My areas of expertise are in marketing, social media, and graphic design.

I graduated from Ithaca College where I majored in Integrated Marketing Communications and minored in writing. I have extensive experience in designing marketing materials (brochures, flyers, etc.), editing and proofreading, book layout and cover designs. I also have experience with website copywriting and social media writing and content management. I am proficient in Adobe Indesign, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
My daily schedule is very flexible - I can work on your project at any time during the week or weekends. Email is my preferred method of communication.

I am flexible as far as payment terms are considered, I typically prefer to invoice my clients through the PayPal service. For communication I prefer to use Skype as a main communication tool, email and Dropbox for file submission between clients.

abstrac: Full Stack | Machine Learning | Python | Django | React | Chat Bots
bio:
We listen, provide solutions, plan, execute, and delive. It is simple.

👉 About us

We are a technology consulting firm specializing in web development, mobile apps, artificial intelligence, and cloud technologies. We are an 8 member team (and growing)!

We pride ourselves on sticking to timelines and budgets. Our clients have liked working with us for our quick communication and for our sense of ownership. We've constantly maintained a 95% to 100% customer rating since Jan 2018 and we strive hard to continue this as we grow.

👉 We specialize in

1) Full-stack web applications
2) Flutter mobile applications
3) Chatbot development (ONE OF THE BEST!)
4) Artificial Intelligence based applications

👉 Process

We set up an initial call to see if there is a good fit with the client and then pick either an hourly or fixed-price mode of working. If the client is not sure of the scope of the project, we start an hourly contract while we help the client scope out the project.

We use GitHub or GitLab for source control and we follow Agile Development methodology. The client can, at any time know the progress of the project by looking at the SCRUM boards on GitHub or GitLab.

👉 Technologies
✔️ Web applications - Django, Node.js, React.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
✔️ Mobile applications - Flutter, Java
✔️ Machine learning - Chatbots, computer vision, natural language processing

✔️ Languages                 - Python, JavaScript, Dart, Java, C
✔️ Backend                      - Node.js, Django, Flask, Falcon
✔️ Frontend                     - React.js, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, JavaScript, CSS
✔️ Mobile                         - Flutter, Dart, Java, Xcode, Android Studio
✔️ Machine Learning    - TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit, Pandas, Numpy
✔️ NLP                              - GPT3, GPT2, BERT, Pegasus, Word2vec, Spacy
✔️ Computer Vision       - Yolo, RCNN, OpenCV
✔️ Cloud                           - AWS, GCP, Azure
✔️ Database                    - Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, etc

Availability: 24×7

Payment Terms:
**************

Normally, we have scheduled the payment terms as below,

If the project budget is over $400, we follow the below 4 payment terms.

• 25% - On the Project Initiation
• 25% - 50% of work completed in the Demo Server
• 25% - 100% of work completed in the Demo Server
• 25% - Launched the site to live and Onsite SEO implementation

If the project budget is below $400, we follow the below 2 payment terms.

• 50% - On the Project Initiation
• 50% - On successful completion of the project.

Payment Methods:
*****************
• Guru Safe Pay invoicing
• Guru Escrow service

Our Key Features:

      * Flexible Timing
      * Cost-effective
      * Research mindset team
      * High-quality team.

Communication Channels:-

Email, Direct US Fixed Line, Email, ZOOM, Skype, etc.


Still have questions? Schedule a NO Obligation call on https://calendly.com/exultcybersolutiongurucertified/30min


* Multiple billing modes for clients to choose from based on their convenience.

       - 6+ web developers
       - 5+ mobile developers
       - 4+ UI/UX designers


* * * * * * * We will be Able To Sign NDA, and We Never Disclose Information About The Project.* * * * * * *


Thanks,

eCybersolution (P) LTD. Team

abstrac: I am a USA qualified Architect with Masters degree from Pratt and registered architect in Saint Lucia, Caribbean
bio:
My home-and-workplace  is located in tropical Caribbean, Saint  Lucia where I obtained primary and secondry education prior to tertiary education in US Virgin Islands and USA mainland.  I developed a love for architecture while in USVI and applied to a few universities about 1967  after which I selected Hampton Institute (which  became Hampton University in 1984.) I remained in USA some 17 years during which time I attended other universities such as Morgan State College, took a few Urban Planning courses,  and later attended Pratt Institute where I obtained a Masters in Architecture in 1977,  focusing on Cultural and Hotel Design /Urban Design.

After this I was recommended for a job by a Pratt professor Ed Cohen  at City of New York Transportation Design Section  as a Project Manager/Urban Designer in the area of Modernization of subway stations in NYC .  I had some Architectural/Planning  experience in Baltimore as well prior to attending Pratt.

In 1982, being the first Saint Lucian architect to be qualified , I was offered a UNDP post to head the Architectural Section at the Ministry of Planning in Saint Lucia under a 2-year contract.  I designed schools, health facilites, offices, masterplan for portion of  downtown redevelopment. and notably the Cultural Center at Barnard Hill.    etc. At the  end of my contract I opened  my own practice.

In this age of austerity we are all concerned about the sustainability of our real estate investments.    Hence when the time comes for engaging  an  architect  you must be selective.   In today’s environment the bottom line is  profit and sustainability.   AFA Inc. (Alexis Felix) places sustainable “green” designs at the vanguard of architectural design  without sacrificing function and aesthetics.  While  installing ”green“ equipment is a good thing, the building form  should  be energy-efficient, smart, eco-friendly, sustainable,  as well as functional and aesthetic.

I operate from 9 am to 5pm Atlantic Standard time , mostly weekdays, but in some situations can work on weekends as well.  I estimate 20-30 hours per week, fees  can be hourly $50-$75 per hour or fixed fees in accordance with the scope and timeframe. I believe in feedback from my clients.
